channel.title: ExploreMusic TV Audio Podcast
channel.description: This podcast contains the audio portion of ExploreMusic's TV show.
channel.itunes:author: Alan Cross

item.title: 0410.EM.Dead Eyes and The Flatliners
item.description: Alan plays some new music from Dead Eyes, plus Chris and Scott of The Flatliners swing by for an in-depth chat with Mr. Cross about their new (and very awesome) album Calvacade.

item.title: ExploreMusic TV Audio Podcast Ep 01 Season 2
item.description: This week's guests are: Shauna De Cartier, Founder 6 Shooter Records; Jake Gold, President/CEO The Management Trust; and Dara Kartz, Manager Go Kartz Management.

item.title: 0024 ExploreMusic TV Audio Podcast Ep 24
item.description:
Guest 1: Ruth Somalo Credits: Filmmaker/Producer James Blunt: Til Your Told to Stop - World Premiere at NXNE www.hornsandtails.com
Guest 2: Stuart Berman Credits: author of "This Book is Broken" (Broken Social Scene), lead singer of The Two Koreas and editor of Eye Weekly
Guest 3: Brendan Tollar Credits: director of "I Need That Record: The Death (or possible survival) of the Independant Record Store" Canadian Premiere at NXNE
item.itunes:author: Alan Cross exploremusic

item.title: 0023 ExploreMusic TV Audio Podcast Ep 23
item.description:
Guest 1:Micheal Hollett Credits: owns NOW magazine and NXNE
Guest 2: Melissa Auf Der Maur Credits: member of Hole, Smashing Pumpkins and has released her own solo material, has a film at nxne and is playing a gig
item.itunes:author: Alan Cross exploremusic

item.title: 0018 ExploreMusic TV Audio Podcast Ep 18
item.description:
Jeff Rogers - Music Director of AUX; Movie Producer, SUCK (starring Iggy Pop, Henry Rollins, Alice Cooper, Malcolm McDowall); Manager, Crash Test Dummies, The Pursuit of Happiness, Rusty, Randy Bachman, Ashley MacIssaac and others.
Moe berg - Singer, Guitarist and Songwriter for The Pursuit of Happiness. (Won 3 CASBY'; Inducted into the Indy Hall of Fame.)
